title: 客户端崩溃，求解
author: redyu
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// This is a token for 1 free hug. Redeem at your nearest Mojangsta: [~~HUG~~]

Time: 19-7-22 上午9:11
Description: Unexpected error

java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
